job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
     * Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)
     * Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
     * Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Engineer

* Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
     * Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)
     * Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
     * Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and configuration of generative AI tools like ComfyUI, the creation of elements for controlling AI image generation, and managing the training of custom models (LoRas). This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and their application.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
job_tasks.justification: Configuring AI Controllers in tools like ComfyUI is a form of adapting or fine-tuning generative models for specific outputs, which falls under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)
job_tasks.justification: Creating control elements and preparing various models/LoRas for AI is directly related to preparing inputs and adapting models for generative tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
job_tasks.justification: Managing and supporting the training of custom models (like LoRas) is a core aspect of fine-tuning generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
job_tasks.justification: This task involves overseeing the application of generative AI to achieve specific, high-quality outputs, which is a modeling-centric responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
job_tasks.justification: While primarily modeling, configuring elements within a tool like ComfyUI can also involve aspects of software development for integrating or customizing AI functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI
job_tasks.justification: The creation of elements, even if for AI control, can involve scripting or using software tools, touching on software development aspects.

soft_skills.skill_name: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
